author: mikem
msg: backporting fix from trunk to 10.4 branch (change 671605)
Fixed SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_INPLACE_COMPRESS_TABLE() bug where during the
defragment phase one part of the code would think there was enough room to
move a record, but because the new record id on the destination page would
take more room than on the source page the move actually would not succeed.
In this case an XSDA3 errror would be thrown and the compress would fail.
This would cause intermittent errors in the nightly concateTests.

author: veithen
msg: Added the necessary interfaces and concrete classes to implement SYNAPSE-378. I added them to
the org.apache.synapse.util.jaxp package because they will probably be useful not only in XSLTMediator, but also e.g. in ValidateMediator.

author: aconway
msg: Plugin framework change: single PluginFactory creates per-target Plugin instances.

msg: SOLR-603: Add partial optimize capabilities and deprecate DirectUpdateHandler
